Nested Classes
enum BitmapLruCache.RecyclePolicy The recycle policy controls if the recycle() is automatically called, when it is no longer being used.

Inherited Methods
From class com.wuman.twolevellrucache.TwoLevelLruCache
synchronized final void close()
Closes the disk cache.
V create(String key)
Called after a cache miss to compute a value for the corresponding key.
synchronized final int createCount()
Returns the number of times create(String) returned a value.
void entryRemoved(boolean evicted, String key, V oldValue, V newValue)
Called for entries that have been evicted or removed.
final void evictAll()
Clear both mem and disk caches.
final void evictAllDisk()
Closes the L2 disk cache and deletes all of its stored values.
final void evictAllMem()
Clear the L1 mem cache, calling entryRemoved(boolean, String, V, V) on each removed entry.
synchronized final int evictionCount()
Returns the number of values that have been evicted.
synchronized final void flush()
Force buffered operations to the file system.
final V get(String key)
Returns the value for key if it exists in the cache or can be created by #create(String).
final File getDirectory()
Returns the directory where the disk cache stores its data.
synchronized final int hitCount()
Returns the number of times get(String) returned a value.
final boolean isClosed()
Returns true if the disk cache has been closed.
synchronized final long maxSizeDisk()
Returns the maximum number of bytes that the L2 disk cache should use to store its data.
synchronized final int maxSizeMem()
Returns the maximum sum of the sizes of the entries in the L1 mem cache.
synchronized final int missCount()
Returns the number of times get(String) returned null or required a new value to be created.
final V put(String key, V newValue)
Caches newValue for key.
synchronized final int putCount()
Returns the number of times put(String, V) was called.
void putToDiskQuietly(String key, V newValue)
static void quietlyAbortUnlessCommitted(DiskLruCache.Editor editor)
final V remove(String key)
Removes the entry for key if it exists.
void removeFromDiskQuietly(String key)
synchronized final long sizeDisk()
Returns the number of bytes currently being used to store the values in the L2 disk cache.
synchronized final int sizeMem()
Returns the sum of the sizes of the entries in the L1 mem cache.
int sizeOf(String key, V value)
Returns the size of the entry for key and value in user-defined units.
synchronized final Map<String, V> snapshot()
Returns a copy of the current contents of the L1 mem cache, ordered from least recently accessed to most recently accessed.
